name: The Rust (Valax321)
description:
Note: this is a reupload of the game, which was originally available on While False Studios. It has been moved here to separate studio and solo projects.

It's done now. Most of them are dead. Some of them worse. You are free to leave, if you can make it.

Developed by Andrew Castillo in GameMaker Studio 2 within 6 weeks for university.
